definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: It had significant difference compared with the lactic acid bacteria fermented soybean milk.
sentences.chinese: 與乳酸菌發酵豆乳相比，口感有明顯的區別。

sentences.english: Lactic acid production from sucrose and sugar cane bagasse by Rhizopus oryzae was studied.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了米根黴利用蔗糖和蔗渣發酵生產乳酸。

sentences.english: The hydroscopicity of plastic was significantly increased by glycerol monostearate or sodium stearoyl lactylate (SSL), but decreased by higher dosage of calcium stearoyl lactylate (CSL).
sentences.chinese: 而較高添加量的硬脂酰乳酸鈣降低了塑料的吸水率。

sentences.english: Several species of Lactobacilli contain multiple S-layer protein genes.
sentences.chinese: 一些乳酸桿菌具有多個表層蛋白基因。

sentences.english: The technology of lactic acid fermented Inonotus Obliquus beverage has been studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對樺褐孔菌乳酸菌飲料的工藝進行研究。

sentences.english: Moreover, this strain was confirmed to be lactic acid type yeast by paper chromatography and gas chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 紙層析和氣相色譜法表明該酵母的產酸類型爲乳酸。

sentences.english: In the blood, it breaks down into lactate and hydrogen ions.
sentences.chinese: 在血液中，乳酸分解爲乳酸根和氫離子。

sentences.english: In the blood, it breaks down into lactate and hydrogen ions.
sentences.chinese: 在血液中，乳酸分解爲乳酸根和氫離子。

sentences.english: Effects of lactic fermentation on fried lotus root chips were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗研究了乳酸發酵對油炸藕片質量的影響。

sentences.english: The optimum Sugar degree was 130BX to the lactic acid fermented drink.
sentences.chinese: 乳酸發酵枸杞綠茶飲料以調糖度130BX風味最好。

sentences.english: The results demonstrate glucose is better than sodium lactate in view of higher Coulombic cumulation and COD reduction.
sentences.chinese: 與乳酸鈉相比，葡萄糖是本體系中較理想的底物。

sentences.english: The synthetic methods of polylactic acid are reviewed, its status and application are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了聚乳酸的合成方法，介紹了其生產應用現狀。

sentences.english: Converted to smoother lactic acid during malolactic fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 在蘋果乳酸發酵期間會轉化爲更圓滑的乳酸。

sentences.english: Converted to smoother lactic acid during malolactic fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 在蘋果乳酸發酵期間會轉化爲更圓滑的乳酸。

sentences.english: Protocatechuic acid , 4-hydmxyphenyl-lactic acid are separated from the plant for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 原兒茶酸，羥基苯乳酸首次從該種植物中分離得到。

sentences.english: To prevent and cure osteomalacia you should take more calcium lactate.
sentences.chinese: 爲了防治骨軟化，你應該多服用一些乳酸鈣。
